issue.title: [R] Converter should be able to ingest part of an Array
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5628](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5628). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4575#discussion_r293939481>

to help with ListArray conversion to list of R vectors without having to materialize each Array
